messages.subject: Re: Fwd: Frozen in Grand Central Station!
messages.msgSnippet: We saw this on a news show... it was hilarious ... workers were calling security and trying to figure out what was going on... people were stopped and taking
messages.messageBody:
We saw this on a news show... it was hilarious ... workers were
calling security and trying to figure out what was going on... people
were stopped and taking pictures and trying to figure it out! One
worker was trying to get through with some sort of golf cart type
thing and couldn't get through... the look on his face as he called
for help was priceless! Evidently this same group has done this in
several places... airports, museums, busy streets etc.. not sure where
this video shows other than GCS but it was really hilarious! I will
have to ask my kids which show it was and see if we can link the video
from that!
Lisa Blocker

messages.messageBody:
-----Original Message-----
From: brad jones <bhmjones@...>

I couldn't believe it when I saw a few people actually walking up to
the frozen
peope and poking them..... I thought it was a rule in New York that you
never
invade someone's personal space at all......

-=-=-=-==-=

Tourists. <g>



~Kelly

Kelly Lovejoy

messages.msgSnippet: I couldn t believe it when I saw a few people actually walking up to the frozen peope and poking them..... I thought it was a rule in New York that you never
messages.messageBody:
I couldn't believe it when I saw a few people actually walking up to the frozen peope and poking them..... I thought it was a rule in New York that you never invade someone's personal space at all......

Kendrah Nilsestuen <carebear-79@...> wrote: **I think if I'd been there I might have thought it was the end of
the world (I'm not dramatic at all apparently <g>).**

I probably would of thought the same thing, lol! It would of freaked
me out for sure. Cool video, thanks for sharing.

Kendrah:)

messages.msgSnippet: I love this!  I think if I d been there I might have thought it was the end of the world (I m not dramatic at all apparently ).  I would have been thinking,
messages.messageBody:
I love this! I think if I'd been there I might have thought it was the end of the world (I'm not dramatic at all apparently <g>). I would have been thinking, 'what do they know that I don't know'???

Thanks Kelly, that was fun :)

Jodi
